item.title: US-160 West/US-550 North Approaching CO-3
item.description: US-160 West/US-550 North Approaching CO-3 in Durango. CO-3 is a short route that runs along the east side of Durango.

item.title: US-160 West at US-550 South
item.description: US-160 west at US-550 south. Use US-550 south for Farmington (New Mexico). US-550 north joins US-160 into Durango.

item.title: US-160 West/To US-550
item.description: US-160 West/To US-550 shields, taken just east of Durango.

item.title: US-50 East at US-550
item.description: US-50 east at US-550. Turn right to continue east on US-50 to Gunnison; continue straight for US-550 south to Ouray. This is the northern end of US-550. US-550 continues south into New Mexico, ending at I-25 in Bernalillo.

item.title: US-550 North/US-160 West at Split
item.description: US-550 North/US-160 West at US-550/US-160 split in Durango. Continue straight for US-550 north to Silverton. Turn left for US-160 west to Cortez and Mesa Verde (National Park).

item.title: US-550 North/US-160 West Approaching US-160/US-550 Split
item.description: US-550 North/US-160 west approaching US-160/US-550 split. Continue north on US-550 for Silverton. Turn left on US-160 west for Cortez and Mesa Verde (National Park).

item.title: US-550 North/US-160 West at CO-3
item.description: US-550 North/US-160 West at CO-3 in Durango.

item.title: US-550 North at US-160
item.description: US-550 north at US-160. US-550 north joins US-160 west through Durango.

item.title: US-550 North - Leaving New Mexico/Welcome To Colorado
item.description: Leaving New Mexico and Entering Colorado on US-550 North. Many of the exits to New Mexico have the Leaving New Mexico - Hasta La Vista sign. The Welcome To Colorful Colorado is a standard welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico - Colorado State Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-173
item.description: US-550 north at NM-173 west to Navajo Lake State Park.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-173
item.description: US-550 north approaching NM-173. Turn right on NM-173 for the Aztec Tiger Sports Complex.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-516
item.description: US-550 north at NM-516 in Aztec. Turn right to continue north on US-550.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-57
item.description: US-550 north at NM-57. While many maps appear to show NM-57 as connecting US-550 to Chaco Canyon from the north, NM-57 does not provide access to Chaco Canyon.

item.title: US-550 North - Chaco Canyon Jct.
item.description: US-550 north at turn off to Chaco Culture National Historic Park.

item.title: US-550 North - San Juan County Line
item.description: San Juan County Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North - Rio Arriba County Line
item.description: Rio Arriba County Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North - Leaving Jicarilla Apache Reservation
item.description: Leaving Jicarilla Apache Reservation on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-573
item.description: US-550 north at NM-573 north to Dulce and Lindrith.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-537
item.description: US-550 north approaching NM-537.

item.title: US-550 North - Elevation 7000 Feet
item.description: Elevation 7000 Feet, descending from the Continental Divide on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North - Continental Divide
item.description: Continental Divide - Elevation 7380 Feet on US-550 north. This is the divide between the San Juan River drainage and the Rio Grande drainage.

item.title: US-550 North - San Juan River Watershed
item.description: Entering the San Juan River watershed at the Continental Divide on US-550 north. The San Juan River flows into the Colorado River.

item.title: End NM-96 West at US-550
item.description: End NM-96 west at US-550. Turn right for Farmington; turn left for Cuba.

item.title: US-64 East at US-550 South
item.description: US-64 east at US-550 South. US-550 joins US-64 east through Bloomfield. Turn south on US-550 for Cuba and Albuquerque; continue ahead on US-64 East/US-550 North for Aztec.

item.title: US-64 West/US-550 South at US-550 South
item.description: US-64 West/US-550 South at US-550 South. Turn left on US-550 south for Albuquerque. Continue ahead for US-64 west to Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West at US-550
item.description: US-64 west at US-550. US-550 south joins US-64 west through Bloomfield. Turn north on US-550 for Durango (Colorado). Continue ahead on US-64/US-550 for Albuquerque.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-550
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-550. Use US-550 north for Aztec. Continue ahead for US-64 West/US-550 South to Farmington.

item.title: US-64 West Approaching US-550
item.description: US-64 west approaching US-550. US-550 joins US-64 through Bloomfield.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North at US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North at US-550 North. Use US-550 north for Aztec; continue east on US-64 for Blanco.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North Approaching US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North approaching US-550 north in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-64 East/US-550 North
item.description: US-64 East/US-550 North in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-550 North at US-64
item.description: US-550 north at US-64. Turn right for US-550 North/US-64 East for Aztec and Blanco. Turn left for US-64 West to Farmington.

item.title: US-550 South
item.description: US-550 south in Bloomfield.

item.title: US-64 East at US-550
item.description: US-64 east at US-550. Turn right for US-550 south; continue ahead for US-64 East/US-550 North. US-550 joins US-64 through Bloomfield.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-197
item.description: US-550 North at NM-197 in Cuba.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-197
item.description: US-550 north at NM-197 south to Crownpoint, Grants, and Gallup.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-4
item.description: US-550 north at NM-4 North in San Ysidro.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-4
item.description: US-550 north at NM-4 north to Jemez Pueblo and Jemez Springs. Continue north on US-550 for Cuba.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-4
item.description: US-550 north approaching NM-4. NM-4 is a mountainous road 44 miles north of here and is not advised for trucks.

item.title: US-550 North Approaching NM-347
item.description: US-550 North approaching NM-347 - Paseo Del Volcan.

item.title: US-550 North at NM-313
item.description: US-550 north at NM-313 - Camino del Pueblo. This type of sign attached to traffic lights with a highway shield is common throughout New Mexico.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 242
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 242 - US-550 West/NM-165 East/Rio Rancho/Placitas. This is the southern end of US-550. The speed limit drops from 75 miles per hour to 70 miles per hour as the highway enters the edge of the Albuquerque metropolitan area.

item.title: End US-550 South at I-25 North
item.description: End US-550 South at I-25 north to Santa Fe. NM-165 begins here and heads towards Placitas.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 242
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 242 - US-550 North/NM-165 East/Bernalillo/Placitas. This is the southern end of US-550.

item.title: US-160 East/US-550 South at US-550
item.description: US-160 East/US-550 South at US-550 in Durango. Turn right to continue south on US-550.

item.title: US-160 East/US-550 South at US-550 South
item.description: US-160 East/US-550 South at US-550 South. Turn right on US-550 for Farmington (New Mexico). Continue ahead on US-160 for Pagosa Springs.

item.title: US-160 East at US-550
item.description: US-160 East at US-550. Turn left for US-550 north; turn right for US-160 East/US-550 South. US-550 joins US-160 through Durango.

item.title: US-160 East at US-550
item.description: US-160 East at US-550. Turn right for US-550 North to Silverton; left for US-550 South/US-160 East to Pagosa Springs.

item.title: US-160 East Approaching US-550
item.description: US-160 East approaching US-550. Turn right for US-160 East/US-550 South; left for Historic Downtown Durango.

item.title: End US-550 North at US-50/CO-90
item.description: End US-550 north at US-50/CO-90 junction in Montrose.

item.title: US-160 West at US-550 North
item.description: US-550 north at US-160 west to Mesa Verde and Cortez, in Durango.

item.title: US-160 West at US-550 South
item.description: US-160 west at US-550 south to Farmington in Durango.

item.title: US-160 West at US-550 South
item.description: US-160 west at US-550 south junction in Durango.

item.title: US-550 - Molas Pass Summit
item.description: Molas Pass on US-550. Elevation 10,910 Feet.

item.title: US-550 North at CO-62 West
item.description: US-550 north at CO-62 west to Telluride and Norwood. Taken in Ridgeway.

item.title: US-550 North at CR-110/CR-2
item.description: US-550 north at CR-110/CR-2 in Silverton.
